statements: SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_owner, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_owner FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_type = '401(k)';
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT account_owner, account_type, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_type = 'IRA';
SELECT account_owner, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_owner, account_type, CONCAT(account_owner, ' has a ', account_type, ' account') AS account_info FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT AVG(balance) AS average_balance, MIN(balance) AS min_balance, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_owner, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_updated_date FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance < 50000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_type, created_date FROM retirement_accounts WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT account_id, account_name, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN retirement_accounts ON transactions.account_id = retirement_accounts.account_id WHERE amount > 1000 AND account_type = '401k' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT holder_name, holder_address FROM account_holders WHERE holder_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM retirement_accounts GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_type = '401k';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM account_holders INNER JOIN retirement_accounts ON account_holders.account_id = retirement_accounts.account_id WHERE holder_address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT holder_name, transaction_date FROM account_holders INNER JOIN transactions ON account_holders.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_type FROM retirement_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM retirement_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 500 ORDER BY contribution_date ASC;
SELECT account_holder_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_type, balance FROM retirement_accounts;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance, created_at FROM retirement_accounts WHERE account_type = '401k' OR account_type = 'IRA' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM withdrawals WHERE withdrawal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT account_holder_name, SUM(withdrawal_amount) AS total_withdrawn FROM withdrawals JOIN retirement_accounts ON withdrawals.account_id = retirement_accounts.account_id GROUP BY account_holder_name ORDER BY total_withdrawn DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, interest_rate FROM Accounts WHERE interest_rate > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY account_name DESC, account_type ASC
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE interest_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type, balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND balance >= 5000 ORDER BY account_id ASC
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.account_id, a.account_name FROM Transactions t JOIN Accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC
SELECT c.customer_name, c.customer_email, a.account_type FROM Customers c JOIN Accounts a ON c.customer_id = a.account_id WHERE a.balance > 20000 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, a.account_id ASC
